mapper.select: SELECT er.request_id, er.buyer_user_id, er.buyer_company_id, cb.company_name_kr AS buyer_company_name, er.supplier_company_id, cs.company_name_kr AS supplier_company_name, er.status AS request_status, er.detail, er.due_date, er.created_at AS request_created_at, resp.response_id, resp.supplier_user_id, resp.status AS response_status, resp.total_price, resp.payment_terms, resp.warranty, resp.special_terms, resp.created_at AS response_created_at FROM estimate_request er JOIN estimate_response resp ON er.request_id = resp.request_id JOIN companies cb ON er.buyer_company_id = cb.company_id JOIN companies cs ON er.supplier_company_id = cs.company_id WHERE er.request_id = #{requestId} AND resp.response_id = #{responseId}

SELECT item.item_id AS item_item_id, item.request_id AS item_request_id, item.product_id AS item_product_id, item.specification AS item_specification, item.quantity AS item_quantity, meta.category_code AS meta_category_code, meta.category_name AS meta_category_name, meta.detail_category_code AS meta_detail_category_code, meta.detail_category_name AS meta_detail_category_name, resp_item.response_item_id AS resp_item_response_item_id, resp_item.response_id AS resp_item_response_id, resp_item.unit_price AS resp_item_unit_price, resp_item.delivery_days AS resp_item_delivery_days FROM estimate_request_item item LEFT JOIN estimate_response_item resp_item ON item.item_id = resp_item.item_id AND resp_item.response_id = #{responseId} LEFT JOIN product_meta_batch meta ON item.product_id = meta.product_id WHERE item.request_id = #{requestId}

SELECT er.request_id, er.buyer_user_id, er.buyer_company_id, cb.company_name_kr AS buyer_company_name, er.supplier_company_id, cs.company_name_kr AS supplier_company_name, er.status AS request_status, er.detail, er.due_date, er.created_at AS request_created_at FROM estimate_request er JOIN companies cb ON er.buyer_company_id = cb.company_id LEFT JOIN companies cs ON er.supplier_company_id = cs.company_id WHERE er.request_id = #{requestId}

SELECT item.item_id AS item_item_id, item.request_id AS item_request_id, item.product_id AS item_product_id, item.specification AS item_specification, item.quantity AS item_quantity, meta.category_code AS meta_category_code, meta.category_name AS meta_category_name, meta.detail_category_code AS meta_detail_category_code, meta.detail_category_name AS meta_detail_category_name FROM estimate_request_item item LEFT JOIN product_meta_batch meta ON item.product_id = meta.product_id WHERE item.request_id = #{requestId}

SELECT er.request_id, er.buyer_user_id, er.buyer_company_id, cb.company_name_kr AS buyer_company_name, er.supplier_company_id, cs.company_name_kr AS supplier_company_name, er.status AS request_status, er.detail, er.due_date, er.created_at AS request_created_at, resp.response_id, resp.supplier_user_id, resp.status AS response_status, resp.total_price, resp.payment_terms, resp.warranty, resp.special_terms, resp.created_at AS response_created_at FROM estimate_request er LEFT JOIN estimate_response resp ON er.request_id = resp.request_id LEFT JOIN companies cb ON er.buyer_company_id = cb.company_id LEFT JOIN companies cs ON er.supplier_company_id = cs.company_id WHERE er.buyer_company_id = #{companyId} ORDER BY er.created_at DESC
